projects.title: Nassim Taleb Visualization
projects.desc: Inequality visualization inspired by "The Black Swan". Built with D3.js!

projects.title: Comb
projects.desc: Created a webapp to convert unsearchable PDFs to searchable ones using OCR. Built with Django, ImageMagick, and PyTesser. HackUVA Center for Open Science award.

projects.title: Rapback
projects.desc: A social network for making rap videos with your friends. Android and iOS.

bio.desc: I am a software engineer at Yahoo helping create their new line of mobile search products. Specifically, I help build the application server, and primarily write code in Scala, Java, and Javascript. Before Yahoo, I interned at AddThis (later acquired by Oracle) and graduated UVA in 2015 (Bachelors in Computer Science). My email is bp5xj @ virginia.edu
